body:
Okay, so I personally love the Omega Update, but these bugs are starting to become ludicrous. I can't even make it to the other teams side without getting killed by somebody invisible. Also, I found people floating in the sky, like what the hell?

Anyways, look at this vid: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=73FU9yFPMx8

title: FFS Avicus

replies.body: The side effects of allowing both 1.7 and 1.8 clients... Hopefully Kylo fixes this though ;p

replies.body: Yeah, I also experienced some buggyness when people were one shotting each other on non-one shot maps. But whatever, I'm sure staff are working to fix it.
